description.zh-cn: 中国男歌手、演员和音乐创作人。
description.en: Chinese male singer, actor, and music creator.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员、歌手、制片人，范丞丞的姐姐。
description.en: Chinese actress, singer, and producer, sister of Fan Chengcheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省下辖地级市，范丞丞的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shandong Province, China, and the birthplace of Fan Chengcheng.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的贵族学校，范丞丞曾在此就读。
description.en: An elite school located in Beijing, China, where Fan Chengcheng once studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国的学校，范丞丞曾在此就读。
description.en: A school in the United Kingdom where Fan Chengcheng once studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的学校，范丞丞曾在此就读。
description.en: A school in the United States where Fan Chengcheng once studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国的艺人经纪公司。
description.en: A Chinese artist management company.

description.zh-cn: 中国偶像男团竞演养成类真人秀节目，范丞丞通过该节目出道。
description.en: A Chinese boy group survival reality show through which Fan Chengcheng debuted.

description.zh-cn: 通过爱奇艺选秀节目《偶像练习生》成立的中国男子限定团体。
description.en: A limited-time Chinese boy band formed through the iQIYI survival show "Idol Producer".

description.zh-cn: 乐华娱乐旗下的中国男子偶像团体。
description.en: A Chinese boy band under Yuehua Entertainment.

nodes.id: 北京市海淀区人民法院

zh-cn: 北京市海淀区人民法院

description.zh-cn: 范丞丞于2023年成立的个人工作室。
description.en: Personal studio established by Fan Chengcheng in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国男歌手及音乐创作人。
description.en: Chinese male singer and music creator.

description.zh-cn: 中国说唱歌手。
description.en: Chinese rapper.

description.zh-cn: 中国说唱歌手。
description.en: Chinese rapper.

description.zh-cn: 范丞丞是范冰冰的弟弟。
description.en: Fan Chengcheng is the younger brother of Fan Bingbing.

description.zh-cn: 范丞丞于2016年11月进入乐华娱乐成为练习生，后作为艺人活动至2023年。
description.en: Fan Chengcheng joined Yuehua Entertainment as a trainee in November 2016 and was active as an artist until 2023.

description.zh-cn: 范丞丞以练习生身份参加选秀节目《偶像练习生》，最终以第三名的成绩作为NINE PERCENT组合成员正式出道。
description.en: Fan Chengcheng participated in the survival show "Idol Producer" as a trainee and officially debuted as a member of the group NINE PERCENT after finishing in third place.

description.zh-cn: NINE PERCENT是通过选秀节目《偶像练习生》最终选拔出的九名成员组成的男子限定团体。
description.en: NINE PERCENT is a limited-time boy band composed of the nine final members selected through the survival show "Idol Producer".

description.zh-cn: 范丞丞作为NINE PERCENT组合成员活动，直至2019年10月6日组合毕业。
description.en: Fan Chengcheng was active as a member of NINE PERCENT until the group's graduation on October 6, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 范丞丞随组合NEXT于2018年6月21日发布出道迷你专辑《THE FIRST》。
description.en: Fan Chengcheng, along with the group NEXT, released their debut mini-album "THE FIRST" on June 21, 2018.

relationships.source: 北京市海淀区人民法院

description.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区法院宣判范丞丞在名誉权官司中胜诉，澄清了关于他是范冰冰私生子的网络谣言。
description.en: The Beijing Haidian District People's Court ruled in favor of Fan Chengcheng in a defamation lawsuit, clearing up online rumors that he was the illegitimate son of Fan Bingbing.

description.zh-cn: 范丞丞于2023年成立个人工作室。
description.en: Fan Chengcheng established his personal studio in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 汪苏泷为范丞丞的单曲《秘密》进行创作并担任制作人。
description.en: Wang Sulong wrote and produced the single "Secret" for Fan Chengcheng.

description.zh-cn: 与马思唯合作发布歌曲《WE DON'T PLAY》。
description.en: Collaborated with Ma Siwei on the song "WE DON'T PLAY".

description.zh-cn: 与谢帝、马思唯合作发布歌曲《拿范儿》。
description.en: Collaborated with Xie Di and Ma Siwei on the song "Na Fan'er".

description.zh-cn: 与谢帝、范丞丞合作发布歌曲《拿范儿》。
description.en: Collaborated with Xie Di and Fan Chengcheng on the song "Na Fan'er".
